attributes.action: include a state directory of gov.departments, state bodies and services, city/county councils,health service etc in all telephone books
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see a state directory section included in all phonebooks.It should be based on the Republic of Ireland model which covers every aspect of life that you can think of.It is far superior to the yellow pages information that you get for every region in the U.K.It even includes the office phone numbers of all members of the government!It would be a great help to give people easier access to many services and organisations.In short it would mean people would have easier democratic access to these services and could be  a useful toolin solving personal problems of many kinds.
